pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Extreme Tux Racer is a racing game featuring Tux, the Linux Penguin. Extreme Tux Racer continues in the tracks of Tux Racer and its forks.
The packages offered here provide a 'vanilla' USE flag, which, when disabled, makes the music files from Tux Racer be installed for those who enjoy the original, nostalgic music sound tracks more. Enabling the USE flag causes music files from Extreme Tux Racer, some of which differ from Tux Racer's music, to be installed instead.

use.flag: Use game music from Extreme Tux Racer instead of the original Tux Racer
